cluster_relations.rel_desc: The power of storytelling is a property or capacity of the practice of storytelling.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Relates a property or capacity to the practice or bearer in which it inheres.

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: PowerType: capacity to connect and convey meaning

remarks: Relation used to link the abstract 'power' concept back to the base practice node.
Relation used to link the abstract 'power' concept back to the base practice node.
Relation used to link the abstract 'power' concept back to the base practice node.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The power of storytelling is described as connecting people across time.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject enables or facilitates human connection across the type of boundary represented by the object (e.g., time, cultures).

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The power of storytelling is described as connecting people across cultures.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject enables or facilitates human connection across the type of boundary represented by the object (e.g., time, cultures).

args.justification: Both relations describe the 'power of storytelling' as producing or enabling human connection across time and cultures. This is more accurately modeled as a causal/enablement effect rather than a mere associative linkage, so the broad relation class group should be CAUSALITY while retaining the more specific rel_cls and canonical_rel_name.
args.remark: Reclassified from ASSOCIATION to CAUSALITY to reflect that storytelling power actively enables cross-context connection.

executed_decisions.justification: Both relations describe the 'power of storytelling' as producing or enabling human connection across time and cultures. This is more accurately modeled as a causal/enablement effect rather than a mere associative linkage, so the broad relation class group should be CAUSALITY while retaining the more specific rel_cls and canonical_rel_name.
executed_decisions.remark: Reclassified from ASSOCIATION to CAUSALITY to reflect that storytelling power actively enables cross-context connection.
